_header: Ne were my true innocent heart
Subjects: roundels; love lyrics; love, vicissitudes of; love, constancy in
_description: A roundel by Charles d’Orléans — fourteen lines

BLRoy16Fii.First Lines:
NE were my trewe innocent hertHow þe hold with her
                    aliauns…
BLRoy16Fii.Last Lines:
…WYth her faire femenyn contenaunsÞe shall neuer from her
                    astert
